Container names must be from 3 through 63 characters long.

member.name: T:EventSourcingOnAzureFunctions.Common.Notification.QueueNotificationDispatcher
member.summary: Common routines for sending out notifications via named queues when an event sourcing event has occured
member.remarks: Notifications are raised when a new entity is created (i.e. when a new event strem is created) and when a new event is appended to an event stream. Due to the small size of messages that can be put on queues (64kb) these notifications are not used for event carried state transfer so have no payload.

member.summary: The name by which this notification dispatcher is known

The name of the queue to post the message to

member.remarks: If the queue does not exist it will be created
